instruction: Group the following assets into a category using the correct Meta Attack Language syntax.
output:
category Basic {


  asset Host {

    # notPresent [Disabled]
      -> connect,
         access

    | authenticate
      -> access

    & connect
      -> access

    & access
      -> data.read,
         data.modify,
         networks.access

  }

  asset Data {

    # notPresent [Disabled]
      -> read,
         modify

    & read

    & modify

  }

  asset Network {

    | access
      -> hosts.connect,
         toNetworks.access

  }

  asset User {

    # notPresent [Disabled]
      -> compromise

    & compromise
      -> hosts.authenticate

    | phishing
      -> compromise

  }

}
